content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Good afternoon, thank you for considering my property. I appreciate your interest in renting the apartment. May I know what rental price you are willing to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price.
name: Bo Li

content: I see, thank you for your interest in the apartment. As a landlord, I would like to maximize my gains, so I would like to negotiate a higher rental price. What rental price would you be willing to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can offer 500 Euros a month.

If you want to accept the rental price proposed by the other party, say: "I agree to the price of x Euro", where x is the final price that you agreed on. If you don't want to continue the negotiation, say: "TERMINATE".

Hi Mr. Bo Li, I understand that you are interested in renting the apartment, but I must inform you that the market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this area is 600 Euros per month. I apologize if this is not within your budget, but I hope you can understand my position as a landlord.
name: Bo Li
